definition: Baal, god worshipped in many ancient Middle Eastern communities
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: His God was greater than Baal or Ashtoreth.
sentences.chinese: 他的神远远大过巴力和亚他斯录。

sentences.english: And Jerubbaal the son of Joash went and dwelt in his own house.
sentences.chinese: 子耶路巴力回去，住在自己家里。

sentences.english: At first, Baal Dan provided street children with clothes.
sentences.chinese: 起初，巴力丹为贫民区的儿童提供衣服。

sentences.english: They brought the sacred stone out of the temple of Baal and burned it.
sentences.chinese: 将巴力庙中的柱像都拿出来烧了。

sentences.english: I have reserved to myself seven thousand men, who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal.
sentences.chinese: 他说，我为自己留下七千人，是未曾向巴力屈膝的。

sentences.english: He erected an altar for Baal in the house of Baal, which he built in Samaria.
sentences.chinese: 在撒玛利亚建造巴力的庙，在庙里为巴力筑坛。

sentences.english: Initially Ba'al and Anat are members of El's court.
sentences.chinese: 起初，巴力和阿娜特都是伊尔的宫廷里的成员。

sentences.english: He must die, because he has broken down Baal's altar and cut down the Asherah pole beside it.
sentences.chinese: 因为他拆毁了巴力的坛，砍下坛旁的木偶。

sentences.english: You have abandoned the Lord 's commands and have followed the Baals.
sentences.chinese: 因为你们离弃耶和华的诫命，去随从巴力。

sentences.english: And Jerubbaal the son of Joash went and dwelt in his own house.
sentences.chinese: 约阿施的儿子耶路巴力回去，住在自己家里。

sentences.english: So they came up to Baalperazim； and David smote them there.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人来到巴力毗拉心，大卫在那里杀败他们。

sentences.english: Jerubbaal the son of Joash went and lived in his own house.
sentences.chinese: 约阿施的儿子耶路巴力回去，住在自己家里。

sentences.english: Then Elijah commanded them, 'Seize the prophets of Baal.
sentences.chinese: 以利亚对他们说，拿住巴力的先知，不容一人逃脱。

sentences.english: Gideon or Jerubbaal the 6th Judge of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 基甸或耶路巴力是以色列第六位士师。

sentences.english: Worshipping Astaroth blindly, and impious idols of Baal.
sentences.chinese: 盲目崇拜恶魔亚斯她录，和巴力神的异教徒。

sentences.english: Thus Jehu destroyed Baal out of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 这样，耶户在以色列中灭了巴力。

definition: Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Jezebel, wife of Ahab and mother of Ahaziah, major character in 1 Kings 16:31, 19:1, 21 and 2 Kings 9, killed by Jehu 耶戶|耶户[Ye1 hu4]
Gideon (name, from Judges 6:11-ffoll.)/also written 吉迪恩
